metadata.name: The Tangerine
metadata.description:
EDITION 1 OF 1  

Title: The Icon  
Artist: Godwits  
Year: 2023  
Smart Contract By: Manifold  
Artist Royalty: 7.5%  

The Icon is a collection of artwork exploring Neo-figurative abstraction which combines elements of both traditional figurative art and utilizing the medium of digital pixels to create a mesmerizing and thought-provoking composition.  

Each piece features a dynamic interplay of colors and shapes, creating a distorted visual experience. The works are created with a limited palette of vibrant colors, blending of hues, and composition of squares which are carefully positioned to give homage to the pixel.  

The compression of the file gives the image a dynamic texture of paint and aesthetics, reminiscent of the early days of digital art. It's a perfect representation of how technology and abstract art can come together to create “NFA” (Neo-figurative Abstraction).  

Limited to personal non-commercial use and resale rights of NFT are granted.  
All other terms & rights are reserved to Abstract Art Labs LLC.
